Shelby's Tea House

Anniversary Tea!

Session on June 24, 2025 with Laura & Christopher

Welcome to Louisville, neighbors! It was truly a delight having you two in the tearoom today! I truly enjoyed our flowing conversations, and sharing tea and space with you! Please text if you have any questions during your stay, and say hi when you're back in town.


[PS: Congratulations on your 4th anniversary!! Here's to many more to come!!]

Teas We Had

Here are the wonderful teas we enjoyed during the ceremony, with links where you could learn more about them:

Rou Gui Wuyi
Category: oolong | Year: 2024 | Temp: | multiple steeps
Notes: nutty, raw, earthy,


Imperial Jin Guan Yin
Category: oolong | Year: 2024 | Temp: | multiple steeps
Notes: floral, vegetal,


Yulan Maocha (Brick)
Category: oolong | Year: 2023 | Temp: | multiple steeps
Notes: floral, smoky, dry mouthfeel,


Imperial Grade Jasmine Pearls
Category: green | Year: 2024 | Temp: | multiple steeps
Notes: floral, creamy, minty,


Yiwu Huangpian (Brick)
Category: sheng pu'er | Year: 2002 | Temp: | multiple steeps
Notes: hay, grassy, sweet, aged,


Yunnan Wild Grown Jiaogulan
Category: herbal | Year: 2024 | Temp: | multiple steeps
Notes: sweet, vegetal,
